Wendy's Replica Twisted Frosty's. That's right, these are not real !
Wendy's is an international chain of fast food restaurants founded by Dave Thomas in 1969 in Columbus, Ohio. Now over 6,700 locations world wide.
Sagittarius Brands is the parent company for Del Taco and Captain D's with a combined store total of over 1,000 units and growing!
Pie Slice Replica
Fake Food - USA Custom Manufacturer
Authentic looking display foods, handcrafted for the most realistic appearance possible. Fake food is also referred to as artificial food, faux food, play food, replica or model foods.
Food props are used in displays in restaurants, grocery stores, trade shows, museums, theme parks and the cinema. Artificial food props are made from plastics and materials approved by the FDA.
Fake food display pieces are made in the US and do not contain lead like many other companies marketing on line. Replica foods for restaurant display dessert trays, beverages and plate presentations and salads.
Museums, like the Smithsonian use Fake-Foods.com for many displays that require the most realism possible.
Foods that look bad after a short time on display can be replaced with lifelike models. Foods that are displayed help promote sales and when food is displayed, customers buy with their eyes. Food models are the perfect solution for displays.
FAKE FOOD, REPLICA, PROPS, FAUX FOOD, REPLICA FOOD, PLAY FOOD, FOOD, FAKE ICE CREAM, PLASTIC FOOD, FOOD SERVICE PROPS
We are the preferred vendor for many of the top Fortune 500 companies in the world.
Fake food can be used for trade show displays and no need to refrigerate our replace every day. Our authentic looking fake foods can be displayed in cases so that cases look full of food. Replica foods can be boxed up after the show and stored away until the next show.
We have customers that use Replica Foods for machine calibration and quality control.
All of our Fake Food products are made in our Tucson, AZ plant custom made to your product specifications. No matter what your need is, we can make your products look realistic and highest quality guaranteed.
Fake Foods shown below are just a sampling of what you can expect for your products.
Email Us: information@fake-foods.com
General Mills - Archway Brand
Trade Show Replica's
General Mills is a Fortune 500 corporation, headquartered in Golden Valley, Minnesota. Their brand portfolio includes more than 100 leading U.S. brands. On average, U.S. shoppers place at least one General Mills product into their shopping cart each time they visit the grocery store.
YUM! Brands, Inc is the largest restaurant chain in the World with over 33,000 restaurants world wide. Fake Foods is a proud vendor for YUM! Here, Fake Foods created lifelike models of their signature desserts and treats. Their brands include Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, KFC, Long John Silvers and A&W. Here is a faux food display used in the A&W Restaurants. Signature floats and other desserts.
Einstein's Cafe Mocha Specialty Coffee Drink
Einstein and Noah Corp., a wholly owned subsidiary of Einstein Noah Restaurant Group, Inc. Headquartered in Lakewood, CO, operates 340 and licenses over 100 Einstein Bros. locations throughout the United States.
Michael Estes, President and Founder, with Jim O'Conner, host of TV Food Network's "The Secret Life of ..."., filming a segment on food styling. Michael covers the secret life of making replica foods with a Chef's twist. Be sure to see the Secret Life of Food Styling.
Michael Estes, Pres.
Meet the President and Founder Michael Estes knows his way around Hollywood and the National Media. He has been the guest of many popular news and television shows like NBC Today, Fox and Friends, CNN, WGN, The Food Network New York, The Secret Life of..., Unwrapped and many more. He is scheduled for two new shows this year. Michael's products can be seen on many Movies, TV shows, Commercials and many popular Theater productions.
Join host Marc Summers and Michael Estes, President of Fake Foods as Marc explores the making of plastic food. Filming takes place at the Tucson manufacturing plant. Be amazed at the degree of detail and complexity of making fake food. Be sure to watch on the TV Food Network. Unwrapped--the show for everyone who's ever worn a pair of wax lips. TV Food Network
Office: 3472 Research Parkway Suite 104, PMB 501 Colorado Springs, CO 80920 Phone: 760-703-0901 E-mail : information@fake-foods.com Plant Operations: 7100 Camino Martin, # 110 Tucson, AZ 85741
